text: Ortigia Syracuse, three-time national champion from '87 to '89. Sport in Sicily developed at a high level only from the second post-war period onwards, although there is no lack of examples between the two wars, with different clubs in the major Italian leagues. The first championship in the national team championship was won in the 1977-78 season in volleyball by the team of Paoletti Catania. ==National titles won by Sicilian teams== At the end of the 2020 sports season, the Sicilian teams won a total of 86 national titles in team sports. title: Sport in Sicily
